Sentencas: A new type of diesel-fueled cogeneration system is proposed in this study.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new diesel-fueled CLHG/SOFC/STIG cogeneration system with CO2 recovery

Sentencas: The system mainly includes solid oxide fuel cell, chemical looping hydrogen generation and steam injection gas turbine cycle.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new diesel-fueled CLHG/SOFC/STIG cogeneration system with CO2 recovery

Sentencas: The system can effectively avoid the carbon deposition of solid oxide fuel cell, recovering CO2 without separation energy consumption.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new diesel-fueled CLHG/SOFC/STIG cogeneration system with CO2 recovery

Sentencas: Additionally, it adopts the way of centralized supply of steam and air, thus reducing the complexity and loss of the system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new diesel-fueled CLHG/SOFC/STIG cogeneration system with CO2 recovery

Sentencas: On this basis, the system is comprehensively evaluated by sensitivity analysis, exergy analysis, energy utilization diagram analysis and exergoeconomic analysis.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new diesel-fueled CLHG/SOFC/STIG cogeneration system with CO2 recovery

Sentencas: It is found that the total power efficiency, exergy efficiency and fuel energy saving ratio of the new system can reach 64%, 60% and 60% respectively.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new diesel-fueled CLHG/SOFC/STIG cogeneration system with CO2 recovery

Sentencas: Meanwhile, the power production cost of the new system is 51.25 $/GJ, and the optimization suggestion of the system is given according to the result of exergoconomic analysis.
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new diesel-fueled CLHG/SOFC/STIG cogeneration system with CO2 recovery

Sentencas: The proposed system provides a theoretical basis and new idea for the design and construction of diesel-fueled energy supply system.(c) 2022
Titulo: Thermodynamic performance study of a new diesel-fueled CLHG/SOFC/STIG cogeneration system with CO2 recovery
